zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[震荡整理趋势]
zh.content:
当前，雪崩币（AVAX）在13.0089美元附近震荡整理，24小时变化为0.63%。整体市场情绪较为平稳，短期内未出现明显的上涨或下跌趋势。若价格继续维持在此水平，可能会形成一个横盘区间，为后续的趋势发展提供基础。

从技术指标来看，MACD值为-0.10579337，显示出当前市场呈现弱势，短期内空头占据主导。但由于RSI数据缺失，无法全面判断超买或超卖状态。SMA(20)为13.48084，表明短期均线仍高于当前价格，可能会对价格形成一定的压力。

支撑位方面，12.9181美元是近期低点，若价格跌破此位，可能会引发进一步的抛售压力。阻力位则在13.0951美元，若突破该水平，可能会吸引更多买盘，推动价格上涨。因此，投资者需要密切关注这两个关键价位。

针对当前市场状况，建议投资者采取观望策略，耐心等待明确的趋势信号。如果价格突破阻力位，可以考虑适度进场，但若跌破支撑位，则应谨慎处理，避免损失。保持灵活应变的交易策略，将有助于在波动的市场中把握机会。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Avalanche (AVAX) is currently trading at $13.0089, reflecting a modest 0.63% increase over the last 24 hours. This slight upward movement suggests a potential stabilization after recent fluctuations. The price action has remained confined within a tight range, peaking at $13.0951 and dipping to $12.9181. Observing this consolidative pattern, traders might anticipate a breakout above $13.10 or a reversal toward $12.90, defining key short-term levels to watch.

The Simple Moving Average (SMA) of 20 periods stands at $13.48084, indicating that the price is currently trading below this average. This positioning suggests bearish sentiment in the short term, as prices are underperforming relative to recent trends. Additionally, the MACD is negative at -0.10579337, which implies a lack of momentum in the upward direction. Traders should consider these indicators as potential signals to exercise caution or look for opportunities to short if the price fails to reclaim the SMA level.

Support levels are identified at the recent low of $12.9181, which could serve as a crucial point for buyers to step in and prevent further declines. If the price breaks below this level, it may trigger additional selling pressure, with the next support potentially around $12.50. Conversely, resistance is observed near $13.10; a breakout above this level could open the door for a retest of the SMA at $13.48, suggesting a potential reversal in trend.

As for trading suggestions, cautious traders might consider waiting for confirmation of a breakout above $13.10 before entering long positions. Conversely, those looking to short could enter if the price decisively breaks below the support at $12.90. Monitoring volume alongside these movements will be essential, as increased volume on breakouts can signify stronger conviction in the price direction.
